Nuxt module to integrate Wide Angle Analytics
Wide Angle Analytics by Input Objects GmbH
Wide Angle Analytics module for Nuxt
is powerful, strictly-GDPR compliant Google Analytics alternative.

You can enable Wide Angle Analytics in your Nuxt projects in just a few steps. No complex configuration needed, as our sane defaults provide you with a reliable and privacy-centric deployment out of the box.
website and create an account. You can enjoy a free 14-day trail. No Credit Card is required.
The Wide Angle Analytics plugin must be initialized with a configuration object as there are required settings without defaults.
The Site ID from the Wide Angle Site settings
Domain hosting the script, can be found in Wide Angle Analytics Site settings
Should script use browser fingerprinting; this might require collecting consent depending on the applicable laws
Should script ingore Do Not Track browser setting. If not enabled, no events will be sent if user's browser has DNT enabled
An array of query parameters that can be passed as part of tracking event. By default only
parameters are passed in the event
An array of URL paths that should not trigger default events such as page view, page leave
If enabled, a change in the URL fragment will not trigger page view event

Custom actions are the most flexible and can be triggered directly from Vue components. As such, their usage is not limitted due to the Shadow DOM.

<template>
  <button @click="sendEvent()">Send Event</button>    
</template>

<script setup>
import { useWaaEvent } from '#imports'
const sendEvent = async () => {
  const params = {
    session: 'cjhw92nf9aq',
    cohort: 'c1233'
  }  
  useWaaEvent('interest', params);  
}
</script>
